thread.title: 'The Ring' star Daveigh Chase allegedly leaves dying man outside of hospital before fleeing scene
thread.title_full: 'The Ring' star Daveigh Chase allegedly leaves dying man outside of hospital before fleeing scene

title: 'The Ring' star Daveigh Chase allegedly leaves dying man outside of hospital before fleeing scene
text:
'The Ring' star Daveigh Chase allegedly leaves dying man outside of hospital before fleeing scene Published February 24, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print 
(AP) 
Daveigh Chase was questioned by police after she allegedly left a dying man outside of a hospital before fleeing the scene. 
TMZ reported that the 26-year-old actress left the unidentified man outside of a Los Angeles hospital in the early morning hours of Feb. 15 and instantly took off without reporting the incident. The gossip news site added that the man was pronounced dead after he was discovered by hospital employees. 
BIGGEST CELEBRITY SCANDALS OF 2016, REVEALED 
Chase was arrested on Wednesday for an outstanding, unrelated warrant after police received a tip she may have been with the man before his death. Chase is reportedly not a suspect in the death and authorities believe the man overdosed and she was merely trying to get him to the hospital. 
While her relationship to the deceased person is unknown, TMZ explained police were told she was “hanging out” with him in the hours leading up to his death. 
FOLLOW UP ON FACEBOOK FOR MORE ENTERTAINMENT NEWS 
Chase is best known for playing creepy girl Samara in 2002’s “The Ring.” She also voiced Lilo in the 2002 animated Disney film “Lilo and Stich.” She recently appear in the 2016 film “Jack Comes Home” opposite Rory Culkin and Natasha Lyonne. 
A rep for Chase didn't immediately return Fox News' request for comment. Advertisement
